title: Star Guardian Taric
body: Self-explanatory. His personality is perfect, and really? Syndra and MF? I understand the appeal to popularity, but they don't really suit the Star Guardian ideology.

No I'd say, make him the one that gives them their powers and guides them... Their "Zordon" if you will (the big face in the wall from the power rangers). I will give you an example which I hope you grasp really well.
Nowadays there's this dispute fewd over the Girl and Boy scouts.
There was an uproar because a girl was refused into the B-O-Y scouts.
There is no need for such a thing, because the G-I-R-L scouts exist.
It's the same here, the SGs are G-I-R-L-S.
Ezreal is also perceived as "gay" by the community, is it that MUCH of a coincidence that people want Taric as that skin? It's not just because oh it's Taric.

You are wrong and you know you are. Why is it such a problem to admit it?
Femininity and Masculinity are different. Do you know why? Because the first one applies to the FEMALE gender, the second one to the MALE gender.
These are a set of actions based on the nature and social obligations of said genders.
It is not plain wrong to say pretty much 95% of all straight men are manly, otherwise they would probably be gay.
As a straight man I do not like doing things that are "female" based. Most women like dancing or gymnastics in PE, while males do not.
Wether you want or not, you will never refute nature.

Your interests, profession, or hobbies do not say anything about your sexuality. A man that dances is not per definition gay, nor would they be gay if they did theater, worked in fashion, did make-up, worked in construction, are soccer players or work as firemen...your character and your sexuality are two VERY different things. 
This all is actually a very common misconception, mostly because its the feminine gay men that stand out the most and are most often seen on tv or social media...because they are flamboyant and actively seek attention, these are, for many heterosexual people, the face of our community...but we are just as, if not more diverse then any other demographic...you wouldn't think every Islamic person is a terrorist, just because most you see and hear of it is in connection with terrorism right? Or that every Dutch person smokes weed and walks on wooden shoos? It's a stereotype...Not a constant for a certain kind of people.

If you look at Varus, Kassadin and Lucian, they are much more gritty and "Oh my life is so hard, Angst, Angst, Angst" which doesn't really fit in with the SG theme. Same goes in a sense for Brand...although he doesn't really fit the bill mostly because he's practically walking magma/fire...

Braum would fit the role of mentor to the SG's just as much as Taric would...Because he, like Taric, has a more loving and optimistic character. And then I'm not talking about putting him (or Taric) in panties and a tutu, but more a heroic wardrobe and aura. this would also go very well with something like Aurelion Sol. Altough not very loving of life per say, he is optimistic and has a lovable character (I find him hilarious at least) and he isn't evil.

Gnar would make for an awesome animal sidekick kind of deal :D Just like Fizz btw...

All in all, I truly think you are missing the point here...We want SG Taric because it fits his character..He's a guardian, an advocate of life and beauty everywhere (not to mention that he literally gets his power from the stars!!!). How does this NOT sound like a star guardian? Besides, Taric NEEDS a new skin...And as Taric main I'd love it to be an ultimate skin...this would offer the perfect opportunity for such a skin ^^
